post:
Hello everyone,

I'm proud to announce the release of our new VPS line! The VPS's are powered by Xen, which means that your resources are dedicated, and you can configure your own kernel modules. You have full control over the VPS. The VPS's are controlled by the SolusVM control panel.

All of our VPS details are located at www.InveHosting.com!

Our first special is get 75% off of your first month! Simply enter invevpsgrandopen at check out.

Our second special is, get our starter VPS with Windows Server 2008 installed for only $10 a month! No promo code required!

Thanks!
